title: Evolution Of Technology
description: This blog guides your evolution of technology journey.

quiz.question: What role was primarily focused on managing and operating early mainframe computers?
Which technological milestone led to the emergence of roles in web development and online marketing?
options: A) The Invention of the Internet
B) The Advent of Mobile Computing
C) The Rise of Cloud Services
quiz._answer: A) The Invention of the Internet

quiz.question: What new roles emerged due to the proliferation of smartphones and tablets?
options: A) Mobile App Developers and Mobile Web Designers
B) Cloud Architects and Cloud Security Experts
C) SEO Specialists and Social Media Managers
quiz._answer: A) Mobile App Developers and Mobile Web Designers

quiz.question: Which technology introduced roles in cloud architecture and cloud security?
Which advancement led to the rise of roles such as Data Scientists and Machine Learning Engineers?
What role focuses on analyzing complex data sets to extract insights and build predictive models?
Which role is crucial for developing and deploying machine learning algorithms and models?
Which of the following technologies created the need for roles in cloud operations and cloud security?
The rise of which technology led to the creation of roles in web development and online marketing?
options: A) The Invention of the Internet
quiz._answer: A) The Invention of the Internet

quiz.question: What technological advancement has driven the need for specialized roles like cloud architects and cloud security experts?
